# Edifice

## Translation

* صرح
	* مبنى ضخم

## Meanings

### Noun

A building; a structure; an architectural fabric, especially a large and spectacular one

---

An abstract structure; a school of thought.

- /ˈɛd.ɪ.fɪs/
